text: Telman Abbasgulu oglu Adigozalov (; 17 July 1953, Balakan Rayon – 15 April 2010, Baku) was an Azerbaijani film, television and theatre actor, TV presenter, People Artist of Azerbaijan (2006). ==Early life== Telman Adigozalov was born on July 17, 1953 in Balakan region of Azerbaijan. He graduated from the School of Drama and Cinema of Azerbaijan State Art Institute and was working for the Azerbaijan National Drama Theater.Azerbaijan’s popular actor Telman Adigozalov dies ==Contributions== He is mostly remembered for vivid roles in many performances such as in Hurshudbanu Natavan,The song remained in the mountains, Macbeth,The Devil, Vagif and Oh, Paris, Paris.... Also, the actor appeared in several television productions: The man in green eyeshades, Ordan-Burdan,Neighbours, in the movies Nasimi, Face to the Wind and I grew up on the beach.Скончался народный артист Азербайджана Тельман Адыгезалов ==Honours== Adigozalov was awarded with the titles of honorable artist of Azerbaijan in 2000 and Azerbaijan people’s artist in 2006.Azərbaycan Dövlət Akademik Mili Dram Teatrı:Telman Adıgözəlov ==See also== *Jeyhun Mirzayev ==References== ==External links== * Category:1953 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Balakən Category:Azerbaijani male television actors Category:Azerbaijani male film actors Category:Azerbaijani male stage actors Category:Soviet male actors Category:People's Artists of Azerbaijan Category:Soviet Azerbaijani people
title: Telman Adigozalov
